org.spongepowered.api.world.biome

Class GroundCoverLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.world.biome.GroundCoverLayer

  • public class GroundCoverLayer
extends Object
    Represents a layer of BlockStates specific to a biome which may be placed in during generation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a new GroundCoverLayer.

      Creates a new GroundCoverLayer.

        Creates a new GroundCoverLayer.

        block - The block state to place down for the layer
        depth - The depth of the layer

    • Method Detail

      • getBlockState

        public Function<Double,BlockState> getBlockState()
        Gets the BlockState for this layer.
        Returns:
        The block state

      • setBlockState

        public void setBlockState(Function<Double,BlockState> block)
        Sets the function which is used to determine the blockstate to place at this layer. The input to the function is a noise value.
        Parameters:
        block - The block state function

      • setBlockState

        public void setBlockState(BlockState block)
        Sets the BlockState for this layer.
        Parameters:
        block - The block state

      • getDepth

        public SeededVariableAmount<Double> getDepth()
        Gets a representation of the depth of this layer. The variable amount will be seeded with the stone noise at generation time.
        Returns:
        The depth

      • getDepth

        public SeededVariableAmount<Double> getDepth(int topYCoordinate)
        Gets a representation of the depth of this layer. The variable amount will be seeded with the stone noise at generation time. This depth may vary based on the Y position.
        Parameters:
        topYCoordinate - The Y coordinate of the first block that this layer will apply to.
        Returns:
        The depth

      • setDepth

        public void setDepth(SeededVariableAmount<Double> depth)
        Sets the SeededVariableAmount representing the depth of this layer. The variable amount will be seeded with the stone noise at generation time.
        Parameters:
        depth - The new variable amount

      • setDepth

        public void setDepth(VariableAmount depth)
        Sets the VariableAmount representing the depth of this layer.
        Parameters:
        depth - The new variable amount

      • setDepth

        public void setDepth(double depth)
        Sets the depth of this layer to the given constant value.
        Parameters:
        depth - The new depth
